definition: there is no such thing as a free lunch (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 shang4 bu4 hui4 diao4 xian4 bing3

definition: a meat pie falls from the sky (idiom)/to have something fall into your lap

sentences.english: The peach pies and chocolate Mousse cakes are nearly finished.
sentences.chinese: 桃馅饼和巧克力慕斯蛋糕也接近卖完。

sentences.english: A small tea-house where only tea and pies can be bought.
sentences.chinese: 一间只卖茶和馅饼的小茶馆。

sentences.english: Pies and tarts often contain berries as do many other pastries.
sentences.chinese: 派和馅饼常以浆果为陷，而许多糕饼类亦然。

sentences.english: A hostess apologized to her guest for serving a pie without any cheese.
sentences.chinese: 女主人为馅饼里没放奶酪向客人道歉。

sentences.english: We dined on chicken, potatoes, salad and apple-pie.
sentences.chinese: 正餐我们吃的是鸡，土豆，凉拌菜和苹果馅饼。

sentences.english: Spread some flour on the table and roll the pastry out very thin .
sentences.chinese: 在桌子上撒些面粉把馅饼皮擀得很薄。

sentences.english: Dan: I did, but it kinda got run over by a Taxi.
sentences.chinese: 我是拿到了馅饼，但是被出租车辗过了。

sentences.english: In fact, everything likes pies or even cats.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，什么人都喜欢馅饼，甚至连猫都喜欢。

sentences.english: She portioned out the cake, so everyone had a piece.
sentences.chinese: 她把馅饼分开，这样每人都得到一块。

sentences.english: But, did the Knave steal the tarts?
sentences.chinese: 但是，杰克到底有没有偷馅饼？

sentences.english: The best and most attractive among them are roast turkey and pumpkin pie.
sentences.chinese: 其中最妙和最吸引人的大菜是烤火鸡和番瓜馅饼。

sentences.english: Very good! You are so clever! The best one among them are roast turkey and pumpkin pie.
sentences.chinese: 其中最妙和最吸引人的大菜是烤火鸡和南瓜馅饼。

sentences.english: Many people think that cornish pasties is miners special food for centuries .
sentences.chinese: 不少人认为这种馅饼是近几个世纪来矿工人的粮食。

sentences.english: I believe that punishing them by depriving them of sweet things only develops greediness.
sentences.chinese: 我想，罚孩子不吃甜馅饼，只能增强他们的贪欲。

sentences.english: The pork pie likely originated as a snack for hunting parties.
sentences.chinese: 猪肉馅饼很可能起源于狩猎会上的一道点心。

sentences.english: She used a rolling pin to flatten the pie dough .
sentences.chinese: 她用擀面棍来擀平做馅饼的面团。

definition: erhua variant of 餡餅|馅饼[xian4 bing3]
a meat pie falls from the sky (idiom)/to have something fall into your lap
wonton/see also 餛飩|馄饨[hun2 tun5]
